text_block_list.text: One day just before tryouts...

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: You're leaving the school?! Whaddya<n>mean?!

Hearing Hishi Amazon's flustered<n>voice booming down
from the rooftop,<n>I hurry upstairs to look into the<n>situation.

There, I see Amazon speaking to the<n>student that she had
been training<n>with previously.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Do you know what you're saying<n>right now? You can't be
serious...

text_block_list.name: Miho Umamusume
text_block_list.text: I am. I can't stick around and pretend<n>any longer.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: How can you say that?!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Remember what you told me? When<n>you first came to see
me in the dorm?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
You said you had a longtime rival that<n>you wanted to beat in
the Twinkle<n>Series!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: What happened to all that fiery<n>passion?!

text_block_list.name: Miho Umamusume
text_block_list.text: ...It's gone.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Huh?

text_block_list.name: Miho Umamusume
text_block_list.text:
The two of us aren't rivals anymore!<n>The game's already
over! She won!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Whaddya mean "over"?

text_block_list.name: Miho Umamusume
text_block_list.text:
Honestly, it'd been nagging at me for<n>a while. After coming
to this school,<n>she just kept getting faster. But my<n>
improvement was little to none.

text_block_list.name: Miho Umamusume
text_block_list.text:
You were even kind enough to help<n>me out... but it was no
use. Yesterday,<n>I lost to her by ten lengths.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Hmm, that is a pretty big margin...

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: But you never know! In the next race,you might beat her by ten lengths!

text_block_list.name: Miho Umamusume
text_block_list.text: That's impossible, and you know it!

text_block_list.name: Miho Umamusume
text_block_list.text: I'm sorry for shouting, Hishiama.

text_block_list.name: Miho Umamusume
text_block_list.text:
But some contests are just obvious<n>from the beginning. So
I'm putting an<n>end to this pointless rivalry between<n>us.

text_block_list.name: Miho Umamusume
text_block_list.text: Well, I need to go. Thank you for<n>everything!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Wha—hey! Wait!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: "Impossible"? "Over"? How can she<n>say that?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Whoa! Oh, it's you...

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Hahaha... I really dropped the ball<n>there, huh? Some dorm
mom I am, not<n>being able to cheer up one of the<n>
youngsters.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
I know for a fact that her goal's not<n>impossible. But
lecturing her isn't<n>gonna help anything.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Argh, dammit! What am I supposed to<n>do now?

Considering Amazon isn't the least<n>bit intimidated by
competition herself, I<n>can understand how this would be a<n>
difficult problem to solve.
As she wracks her brain for the<n>answer...

text_block_list.name: Biko Pegasus
text_block_list.text: There you are, Hishiama! I've been<n>looking all over for you!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Well, if it ain't Biko. What's up?

text_block_list.name: Biko Pegasus
text_block_list.text:
We're racing on the same day of<n>tryouts, right? The groups
were just<n>announced, so I thought I'd let you<n>know the
big news!

text_block_list.name: Biko Pegasus
text_block_list.text: Get this—you're in the same group as<n>Brian!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: What?!

She's a powerful Umamusume who<n>has already caught the
attention of<n>every trainer around.

Her older sister, Biwa Hiyahide, has<n>been tearing up the
track since her<n>own debut, but Brian is said to<n>possess
even greater potential.
choice_data_list: (What an opponent to go up against...)
(What an opponent to go up against...)

text_block_list.text:
I brace myself, fully expecting<n>Amazon to be shaken to the
core.<n>However...

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Got it. Thanks, Biko.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Talk about perfect timing!
With a fearless grin, she dashes off<n>at full speed.
I hurry after her, only to find...

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Hnghyaaah! Huff, puff...

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Huh? Did you follow me here?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
What's it look like? I'm training!<n>Guess I oughta start out
with fifty or<n>so hill sprints.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Actually, maybe that's not enough. I<n>mean, this is Brian
we're talkin'<n>about. I'll have to train like hell to go<n>
one-on-one against her!
choice_data_list: You're not the least bit scared?
You're not the least bit scared?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Course I'm not! Who do you think I<n>am?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Besides... I'm not good with words<n>like Fuji.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
So the best I can do for somebody in<n>a funk... is just to
show 'em how it's<n>done.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: But even so, I'm gonna pull out all the<n>stops.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Nothing out there is impossible right<n>from the get-go! You
never know the<n>outcome of a match 'til you give it a<n>try!

Amazon makes a deeply heartfelt<n>declaration, her eyes
burning with<n>resolve.

I find myself wanting to catch a<n>glimpse of the future that
she is so<n>intently focused on...
choice_data_list: Mind if I help you train?
Mind if I help you train?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Wait, really? You sure? Haha, but<n>you're not even my
trainer, ya big<n>weirdo!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
I don't mind one bit—in fact, that'd be<n>a huge help. Go
ahead and whip me<n>into shape!

Thus, we agree for me to oversee<n>Hishi Amazon's training
sessions<n>until tryouts.
